Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 350MHz or better
RAM: 256MB
Video card RAM: 32MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run MysteryPI The London Caper_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Travel to London, England in the first European episode of the hit Mystery P.I. series: Mystery P.I. - The London Caper! You're the world famous Mystery P.I. and you've been hired to track down the stolen Crown Jewels. Search 25 intriguing London settings and find over 2,000 hidden objects to solve this caper. If you return the jewels to the Royal Family you'll receive a generous reward. But hurry - you have only 17 hours before the ransom is due!
